text: "Hero" is a song by Mariah Carey. It is from her third album, Music Box. The song was released on October 19, 1993. It became Carey's eighth number-one song in America. It was the fifth best-performing song of 1994 there. "Hero" is a pop and R&B; ballad. Although Carey explained that she was unhappy with the song, she realizes how important the song is to her fans and performs it live at her concerts because of its uplifting message. Category:1993 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Mariah Carey songs Category:Pop ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Hero (Mariah Carey song)
